chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has a problem:

I bought the phone in excellent condition and it turns out that when I got the phone, it came with camera protectors that were half loose and didn't fit into the case that came with the phone. Then, being half loose, they fell off and it turned out that one of the cameras has a dent on the exterior of the screen that doesn't affect its functioning but can be seen at first glance. I want you to offer some proposal whether it's a price reduction in good condition or normal condition because excellent condition is not what I paid for. I've attached the photos and hope to get a response soon, thanks.

Thanks,

The customer confirms that the device has not been opened or repaired by a third party, exposed to water or suffered damage due to impact or fall.

Dear ecomobile

The customer indicates that the cell phone arrived with a broken camera and he realized it when it had no glass.

Regards,
Belinda from the Back Care Team

Dear backcare, please inform the following message to the customer. 

We are very sorry to hear that you feel that the appearance of the product does not conform to the grade purchased. Rather than sending a return, would you consider a 60 euro commercial gesture instead? You could significantly reduce the harmful carbon dioxide emissions generated by logistics carriers in facilitating a return of a device without hardware issues. This would definitely be a big help to the improvement of our environment. Thank you.

Regards,
JY
